Vps_CaptChStatus Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Capture API

Detailed Description

Capture Channel Get Status IOCTL result.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::captFrmCount

[OUT] Number of frame's captured by driver into the buffer provided by application. This will also get incremented in case of frame drop mode.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::dequeueCount

[OUT] Counter to keep track of how many requests are dequeued from the driver.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::descErrCount

[OUT] Capture descriptor not written by hardware error count. Not all interfaces support this, please refer interface specific header for details.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::droppedFrmCount

[OUT] Number of frame's dropped by driver due to unavailability of buffer from application - used in frame drop mode.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::fidRepeatCount

[OUT] Counter to keep track of getting two consecutive top or bottom fields.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::fldCount[FVID2_MAX_FIELDS]

[OUT] Field count for each field.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::isVideoDetected

[OUT] TRUE: Video detected at this channel, FALSE: Video not detected at this channel. Note: This flag is updated properly only when the capture is in progress as the time stamp comparision makes sense only then. Otherwise when the capture is stopped, this will always return as TRUE.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::lastFid

[OUT] Last FID received.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::lastFrmHeight

[OUT] Last frame/field captured height in lines.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::lastFrmTimeStamp

[OUT] Last frame/field captured timestamp in OS ticks.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::lastFrmWidth

[OUT] Last frame/field captured width in pixels.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::maxRecvFrmHeight

[OUT] Maximum frame/field height received from start to now.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::maxRecvFrmWidth

[OUT] Maximum frame/field width received from start to now.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::minRecvFrmHeight

[OUT] Minimum frame/field height received from start to now.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::minRecvFrmWidth

[OUT] Minimum frame/field width received from start to now.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::queueCount

[OUT] Counter to keep track of how many requests are queued to the driver.

UInt32 Vps_CaptChStatus::repeatFrmCount

[OUT] Repeated frame/field count - used in frame repeat mode.
